docs.lead_paragraph: A blistering start allowed Dean Burmester to surge away from the field at the start of the final round before surviving a late wobble to secure his maiden European Tour title when he won the Tshwane Open by three shots on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Burmester Wins Maiden Title After Blowing Away Field
headline.main: Burmester Wins Maiden Title After Blowing Away Field

docs.snippet: A blistering start allowed Dean Burmester to surge away from the field at the start of the final round before surviving a late wobble to secure his maiden European Tour title when he won the Tshwane Open by three shots on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), junior partners in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, said on Sunday they would launch a new push to legalize same-sex marriage in Germany, a move opposed in the past by Merkel's Christian Democrats.

headline.print_headline: Germany's Social Democrats, Greens Press for Same-Sex Marriage
headline.main: Germany's Social Democrats, Greens Press for Same-Sex Marriage

docs.snippet: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), junior partners in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, said on Sunday they would launch a new push to legalize same-sex marriage in Germany, a move opposed in the past by Merkel's Christian Democrats....

docs.lead_paragraph: Victims of child sex abuse in New York say the political power of the Roman Catholic Church and other institutions is preventing lawmakers from passing a law that would relax one of the nation's tightest statutes of limitations on filing criminal charges and lawsuits.

headline.print_headline: Victims, Roman Catholic Church Spar Over NY Sex Abuse Bill
headline.main: Victims, Roman Catholic Church Spar Over NY Sex Abuse Bill

docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's Prosecutor General Rodrigo Janot plans to ask the Supreme Court for authorization to investigate ministers in President Michel Temer's cabinet and senior senators from his PMDB party for corruption as soon as this week, a source familiar with the plans said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil's Prosecutor Plans to Investigate Ministers, Senators for Graft-Source

docs.lead_paragraph: Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport in Abuja will close while its runway is repaired, causing travel problems and upending the lives of vulnerable workers.

headline.main: Airport Will Temporarily Shut, Disrupting a Nigerian Lifeline

docs.lead_paragraph: A transgender boy who won a girls wrestling state title in Texas says he would compete against boys if allowed and is taking lower doses of testosterone to try to be fair to his opponents.

headline.print_headline: Transgender Boy With Girls Wrestling Title: 'I Don't Cheat'
headline.main: Transgender Boy With Girls Wrestling Title: 'I Don't Cheat'

docs.snippet: A transgender boy who won a girls wrestling state title in Texas says he would compete against boys if allowed and is taking lower doses of testosterone to try to be fair to his opponents....

docs.lead_paragraph: New York City police said on Sunday there was no indication of vandalism after several headstones were found toppled at a predominately Jewish cemetery in Brooklyn over the weekend.

headline.print_headline: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery
headline.main: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery

docs.snippet: New York City police said on Sunday there was no indication of vandalism after several headstones were found toppled at a predominately Jewish cemetery in Brooklyn over the weekend....

docs.lead_paragraph: Iran and neighboring Azerbaijan agreed on Sunday to work towards completing their portion of a planned freight railway route from Europe to South Asia, Iranian state media reported.

headline.print_headline: Iran and Azerbaijan to Join Railways as Part of Freight Route
headline.main: Iran and Azerbaijan to Join Railways as Part of Freight Route

docs.snippet: Iran and neighboring Azerbaijan agreed on Sunday to work towards completing their portion of a planned freight railway route from Europe to South Asia, Iranian state media reported....

docs.lead_paragraph: Filmmaker Gabrielle Burton says she didn't plan for her documentary about the drag scene in Ohio's capital city to achieve wider distribution at a time of political and cultural division.

headline.print_headline: Documentary Explores Drag Scene in City of the US Heartland
